org.usfirst.frc2084.vision

Class TargetPair

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc2084.vision.TargetPair

  • public class TargetPair
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a possible pair of targets (hot and static). It also determines whether they actually are targets.
    Author:
    Ben Wolsieffer

    • Constructor Detail

      • TargetPair

        public TargetPair(Target staticTarget,
          Target hotTarget)
        Creates a possible target pair. If hotTarget is null, then the algorithm assumes the static target is valid because it has nothing to test it against. Otherwise it tests the targets to see if they match certain criteria.
        Parameters:
        staticTarget -
        hotTarget -
